text: On the Recording of Zoom Meetings of Class To all students on distance learning It is actually illegal for teachers to record zoom meetings without the consent of everyone in the classroom  If you complain to the teacher about you being recorded  the teacher should stop recording immediately amp x B gt Zoom makes it easy for hosts and participants to record class sessions  While it is useful to have a record of the class  each session will contain images of your students  along with identifying information about each of them  You ll need permission from each student in order to record a class session  You ll also need permission in order to use or share the recording anywhere outside of class  Once the recording has been shared  it  like everything on the internet  is now outside of your control  The safest approach  in terms of student privacy  is to refrain from recording class sessions entirely   amp x B Source   https www learner org professional development zoom and data privacy https www learner org professional development zoom and data privacy
summary: It's illegal for teachers to record zoom meetings without the consent of everyone in the classroom. It's also illegal to use or share the recording outside of class. The safest approach in terms of student privacy is to refrain from recording class sessions entirely.
cleaned: illegal teacher record zoom meeting consent classroom illegal use share recording outside class safe approach term student privacy refrain record class session entirely
